publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-47001 *#* Stuart McMillan: World Pipe Band Championshipsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Simon Fraser University of Vancouver, Canada on winning the World Pipe Band Championships; notes the success of the event, held at Glasgow Green, which attracted over 40,000 spectators and bands from 16 countries; further notes that Strathclyde Police Pipe Band was the highest-placed Scottish band, finishing an excellent fourth overall out of over 200 bands, and *considers* that its future success will be jeopardised if planned cuts to Strathclyde Police Pipe Band are implemented. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
